name: meme
description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: libgcrypt
dependencies.description: Cryptographic library based on the code from GnuPG.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Cray's MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of
the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: imagemagick
dependencies.description:
ImageMagick is a software suite to create, edit, compose, or convert
bitmap images.

dependencies.name: perl-xml-parser
dependencies.description: XML::Parser - A perl module for parsing XML documents
